participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

ksads_sleepprob_raw_814_t.Description: In the past two weeks, how often did you have trouble falling asleep or staying asleep when you were tired and wanted to sleep? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_sleepprob_raw_816_t.Description: Was there ever a time, for two weeks or longer, that you had trouble falling asleep or staying asleep when you were tired and wanted to sleep? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_sleepprob_raw_817_t.Description: Was there ever another time, for two weeks or longer, that you had trouble falling asleep or staying asleep when you were tired and wanted to sleep? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_sleepprob_raw_818_t.Description: When was that? If this was true of you more than once, let me know when it was the worst.
